title: Requirements Gathering for Immutable State Management System
description: Gather and document project requirements from stakeholders. This task involves identifying functional and non-functional requirements, necessary components, performance metrics, security considerations, and other relevant specifications.

title: Design Architecture
description: Develop the high-level design architecture for the ImmutableStateManagementSystem, including data structures and pure functions.

title: Database Design
description: Design the database schema for storing and managing immutable state data.

title: Backend Implementation - Core System
description: Implement the core functionality of the ImmutableStateManagementSystem, including state transition logic and data persistence.

title: Frontend Implementation - UI & Integration
description: Develop the user interface and integrate it with the core system for seamless state management.

title: Testing
description: Perform functional and unit tests to ensure the correctness and performance of the ImmutableStateManagementSystem. Tests will cover all possible state transitions, edge cases, and compatibility with existing systems.

title: Deployment and Documentation of ImmutableStateManagementSystem
description: Deploy the ImmutableStateManagementSystem to production environments, document its usage, best practices, and provide a tutorial for implementation. This includes setting up the system, integrating it with existing applications, and troubleshooting common issues. The documentation should also include sections for testing and security considerations.
